name: Treasure Roll
description:
TRY AND ESCAPE THE ISLAND.
COLLECT AS MANY COINS AS POSSIBLE
BEFORE THE TIME RUNS OUT.

MECHANICS:

BEFORE U CAN COLLECT THE COINS U SHOULD ROLL A DICE.

THE NUMBER U GOT ON A DICE X 10 IS EQUAL TO THE TIME U HAVE 

TO DO IT. ONCE U HAVE ENOUGH TO BUY THE PORTAL IN THE MIDDLE U SHOULD CLICK [E] TO OPEN IT AND GO THROUGH, THERE U GO U WON.

DICE INFO:

IF U ROLL 1 UR GET 10 SEC

IF U ROLL 2 UR GET 20 SEC

IF U ROLL 3 UR GET 30 SEC


IF U ROLL 4 UR GET 40 SEC

IF U ROLL 5 UR GET 50 SEC

IF U ROLL 6 UR GET 60 SEC

CONTROLS:

WASD TO MOVE

W = UP

A = RIGHT

S = DOWN

D = LEFT

CREDITS:

Art: Me, Code: Me, Sound:  Everret Evolved.
